Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network.socket.client

Class VirtualSocketGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network.socket.client.VirtualSocketGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualGameController, Remote
public class VirtualSocketGameController extends Object implements VirtualGameController
This class represents the game controller for the socket implementation
